price: 60 C’est Nous qui vous avons prédestiné la mort et rien ne pourra Nous empêcher
arabic: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: naḥnu qaddarnā baynakumu al-mawta wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
